name: Leadership
description: The director manages the development of all DP Tech products and collaborates with other Daily Pennsylvanian teams, from editors to designers, in order to integrate them seamlessly.

name: Mobile Developers
description: The developers behind DP+, the iOS and Android app where you can keep up with the latest Daily Pennsylvanian, 34th Street, and Under the Button articles!

name: Web Developers
description: The developers in charge of building project pages and maintaining the websites of The Daily Pennsylvanian, 34th Street, and Under the Button.
